job.title: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test
job.description: stronguJob OverviewbrbrustrongApplied Systems Inc a worldwide leader in insurance technology is currently searching for a strongSeniorstrong strongSoftware Development Engineer in Test SDET strong to join our corporate Quality Engineering Organization In this role you will be responsible for the development and maintenance of automated tests as we migrate to a microservices architecture You will carry out various tasks to ensure our test approaches both manually and automated are effectively and efficiently designed implemented and maintained for both legacy and new development You will leverage software engineering best practices to provide information feedback and expertise about software quality and development processes to deliver defectfree applications You will work with a team of SDETs to ensure our test automation framework and platform is highly scalable and performant with a technical design that allows for future innovation without complete refactoringbrbrstronguRESPONSIBILITIESbrustrongulli Exhibit strong handson knowledge in develop automated testing using modern software development and testing tools lili Ensure automated test design adheres to the overall company architecture and quality assurance principles lili Collaborate with team members across product architecture development DevOps and testing teams in designing automated testing approaches lili Promote and support implementation of CICTCD pipeline lili Exercise fundamental good software engineering practice when developing automated tests such as designcode reviews lili Maintain and enhance test automation frameworks for UI Microservices amp API lili Able to provide indepth analysis to resolve technical issues anticipate risks and ensure timely management escalation lili Provide automated test solutions to deliver for both functional and nonfunctional software quality lili Work with stakeholders to plan estimate amp implement test automation strategies lili Ensure compliance to automation framework standards amp best practices lili Facilitate automated ondemand test automation metrics lili Maintain and update technical documentations relating to test architecture design steps integration processes or procedures lili Participate in technical design meetings to ensure clear direction in areas of responsibilities lili Maintain test automation and defect tech debts in timely manner lili Seek stakeholder feedback via test automation demos lili Provide coaching and mentoring to junior SDET members lili Exhibits behaviors which exemplify Applied Systems Core ValuesbrbrliulstronguQUALIFICATIONS FOR THIS JOBbrustrongulli Have passion for shipping software that meets customers definition of quality lili 5 years of software engineering amp testing experience lili Bachelors Degree or equivalent experience in computer science technology or equivalent work experience lili 3 years of handson experience in code development procedures work processes and application systems with objectoriented programming such as C VBNet  Java Ruby Python or C as well as JavaScript Typescript lili Experience working with SQL Server or other databases lili Extensive working knowledge with automated or manual testing with UI andor API layers such as SOAP RESTRESTful web mobile and desktop application testing lili Indepth knowledge of common automated testing tools such as Cypress Selenium Katalon etc lili Working knowledge of microservices cloud computing and related technologies such as AWS GCP Azure Kubernetes Docker Apigee lili Experience in constructing modern test strategies and quality gating policies within CICTCD pipelines lili Has passion for continuous learning lili Strong work ethic and excellent problemsolving skills strong logical reasoning and solution oriented lili Ability to work with others in a teamoriented environment is a must lili Positive and adaptable with multitasking in a continually changing
